description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A pixel perfect way of life is under threat when a scientific experiment gone wrong uncovers a new dimension composed entirely of vectors! Run, jump and shoot your way through 36 levels to save your bitmapped buddies, hold back the vector invasion, and save all of raster kind!
description.short: A pixel perfect way of life is under threat when a scientific experiment gone wrong uncovers a new dimension composed entirely of vectors! Run, jump and shoot your way through 36 levels to save your bitmapped buddies, hold back the vector invasion, and save all of raster kind!
